wallet.post_desc: You can earn point by posting regularly. Posting gives you upto 15 points.
wallet.comment_desc: Each comment you make helps you to grow your audience and also earns you upto 5 points.
wallet.checkin_desc: Checking in regularly gives you 0.25 points.
wallet.vote_desc: By voting you give reward to other creators and also earn back upto 0.01 x vote weight points.
wallet.reblog_desc: Share what post you like with your friends and earn points.
wallet.login_desc: When you login into app first time you earn 100 points.
wallet.checkin_extra_desc: Consistent use of app gives you extra chances to earn more points, be more active and earn more.

login.signin_title: To get all the benefits of using Esteem
login.description: Thông tin đăng nhập của người dùng được lưu cục bộ trên thiết bị. Thông tin được xóa khi đăng xuất!
login.steemconnect_description: If you don't want to keep your password encrypted and saved on your device, you can use Hivesigner.

editor.title: Tiêu đề
editor.limited_length: Maximum length of each tag should be 24
editor.limited_dash: Use one dash in each tag
editor.limited_lowercase: Only use lower letters in tag
editor.limited_characters: Use only allowed characters in tag
editor.limited_firstchar: Tag must start with a letter
editor.limited_lastchar: Tag must end with letter or number
